data.name: SkyPrimal
data.detailed_description:
Having lost your tribe, you as the sole survivor, find yourself in an era of deadly danger and exciting adventures. You have to build yourself a shelter, make weapons, protect yourself from wild animals, and prove that you are not a prey, but a predator.



Build your shelter, craft tools, weapons, collect resources in different biomes to create whatever you need, and conquer the world as you see it.

Features :

  • Implemented construction, craft, fishing, farming, hunting, cooking.
  • Random open world with 5 biomes
  • Lots of buildings, tools, weapons and resources.



In addition, there are many more different tasks and tests waiting for you.

data.short_description: Having lost your tribe, you, as the sole survivor, find yourself in an era of deadly danger and exciting adventures. You have to build yourself a shelter, make weapons, protect yourself from wild animals, and prove that you are not a prey, but a predator.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64-bit only)
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.2 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64-bit only)
  • Processor: Quad Core 1.8 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.15
  • Processor: Intel i5 Series @ 3.8 GHz or greater
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon Pro 580 or better with at least 4 GB VRAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
